talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>I'll work extra hard to provide top-notch
security in order to protect Prince Sidon
and Lady Yona!
talk0042: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>We'll protect Lady Yona from all danger!
talk036_01:
<snd:Work_01>I will redouble my focus and devote myself
to daily training to be the best guard that
I can be!
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Us Zora soldiers must be strong, just like
Prince Sidon and you, our hero!

From now on, I'll double my efforts at
training! Maybe even triple!
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>The water that Prince Sidon has cleansed
flows from Mipha Court to Zora's Domain.

That's why we can climb the waterfalls
from the domain all the way here.

<snd:Sad_00>I really wish we had been able to return
your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>to you, Link. It would be
really useful to you about now.
talk035_01:
<snd:LaughS_01>As for me, I'm vigilantly guarding the
domain.<sp:5:0:0> Not even a single fish will swim
through without my notice!
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>That's right, Link! You know the drill.
With your faithful <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, even a
Hylian like you can climb waterfalls.
I believe Lady Yona is trying to repair it.
She's in the domain.<sp:5:1:0> Have you asked her
about it yet?
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Please speak with her.<sp:5:1:0> I'm sure your <clr:0000>Zora
armor <clr:ffff>would be really useful about now!
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>We can climb the waterfalls from the
domain all the way here because the
prince is cleansing the water for us.
I really wish we had been able to return
your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>to you, Link. It would be
really useful to you about now.
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>That's right, Link! You know the drill.
With your faithful <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, even a
Hylian like you can climb waterfalls.
I believe Lady Yona is trying to repair it.
She's in the domain.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Please speak with her.<sp:5:1:0> I'm sure your
<clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>would be really useful
about now!
talk033:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You have saved our domain when it was in
crisisâ€”not once but twice! <sp:5:0:0>I'll never forget
what you've done for us, Link!
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Right! I'm looking forward to our
next chat.
talk034:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Link!<sp:5:1:0> You'll be happy to know that
Zora's Domain is enjoying its
hard-earned peace!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Shhh!<sp:5:0:0> Keep it down!<sp:5:0:0> The prince requires absolute
quiet to concentrate on his important work...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wait... Link?!


You came here to see Prince Sidon?


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Well, since it's you, that should be no
problem at all.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure Prince Sidon
will be thrilled to see you.
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, my mistake!<sp:5:1:0> I didn't realize you had
already spoken with Lady Yona.

You know the drill. With your faithful
<clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, even a Hylian like you
can climb waterfalls.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>But I hear she needs some kind of special
fish in order to finish repairing the armor.<sp:5:1:0>
Hm...<sp:5:0:0> I wonder kind of fish.
That reminds me that Gruve is over by
Mipha's statue, and he said he's seen
some unusual fish there recently.
talk035:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>The red moon has brought back all the
monsters in the Ja'Abu Ridge fort, alas.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>But I think they're afraid of you, Link,
because they seem to be hesitant to
move on the domain.
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Only Prince Sidon could keep purifying
that amount of filthy water.

Naturally, Lady Yona can also control the
water like that, but there's a good reason
that she isn't here.
You see, Prince Sidon asked her to watch
over the infirmary.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>It turns out she really was the best Zora
for the job!<sp:5:0:0> That role was perfect for
Lady Yona, who is kindness incarnate.
While the young ones are in the
throne room, <sp:5:0:0>he's generating water and
overseeing the investigation of the ruins.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Prince Sidon's command is exceptional,
to say the least!
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Lady Yona is in the domain trying her best
to finish repairing your <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>.

You know the drill. With your faithful
<clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, even a Hylian like you
can climb waterfalls.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>But I hear she needs some kind of special
fish in order to finish repairing the armor.<sp:5:1:0>
Hm...<sp:5:0:0> I wonder kind of fish.
That reminds me that Gruve is over by
Mipha's statue, and he said he's seen
some unusual fish there recently.
talk036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We'll still need to protect the domain from
menaces such as the sludge, even under
King Sidon's rule.
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Ever since the Upheaval, Prince Sidon
has been working so tirelessly, he hasn't
been able to return home to the domain.
Lady Yona has been providing leadership
at Zora's Domain in his stead.

<snd:Greeting_00>Our precious Zora's Domain is to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>
of here, as it ever was.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>To think Lady Yona has also come here.
I must focus even more intently on
defending them.
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Lady Yona has been providing leadership
at the domain in the prince's stead.

Our precious Zora's Domain is to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>
of here, as it ever was.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>You're amazing! The way you defeated
that monster... Wow!

If it had only been me and Rivan, we
might have been in big trouble.

<snd:Happy_01>Thank you so much, Link!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>Link! Thank you for saving the domain
once again! I could never repay you for
all that you have done for us.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But even though the sludge is gone,
these foul villains keep showing up!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>They're monsters.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>They built a fort past East Reservoir Lake<sp:5:0:0>
in the <clr:0000>north of Ja'Abu Ridge<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0201>They're taking advantage of the chaos
that was caused by the sludge.<sp:5:0:0> What
rotten villains!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>Some villainous monsters built a fort
nearby recently.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's on the other side of the reservoir
that's to the east of here...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>north of
Ja'Abu Ridge<clr:ffff>.
There's no way to know if it's true,<sp:5:0:0>
but there's a rumor that a Hylian has
been captured.
<snd:TalkPositive>Please be careful out there, Link.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Regarding the subject of that
monster fort...

We decided to gather some soldiers to
go and dispense justice.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>We'll make them pay for their actions!<sp:5:1:0>
Ah, my fins are shivering with excitement!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>What?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


So, I guess that means...<sp:5:0:0>you did all that...<sp:5:0:0>
on your own?!
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Well, now. That...<sp:5:0:0>is quite impressive, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
Haha!<sp:5:0:0> Ha...

<sp:3:0:2:0301>We put together a team and prepared all
night.<sp:5:1:0> Yet you did this all by yourself...<sp:5:0:0>
Ha, indeed.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Well, let's leave it at that.<sp:5:0:0> I'm so grateful
that the domain is safe once again!

Please, allow me to thank you. Take this.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>This was our war fund for striking down
our enemy. However, since our objective
has already been achieved...
Please accept this as a reward, Link!
You've more than earned it with your
distinguished service.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>As for me, I should report that the threat is gone
at once...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>There's no way to know if it's true,
but there's a rumor that a Hylian has
been captured.
That is unacceptable, and for all we
know, the domain could be targeted
next. We can't just sit back and watch.
<snd:Think>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> We need a plan, and fast.
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Wow.<sp:5:0:0> That certainly is impressive, Link!<sp:5:1:0>
Hahaha! <sp:5:0:0>Ha...

<sp:3:0:2:0301>We assembled our troops and prepared
all night.<sp:5:1:0> Yet you did this all alone...<sp:5:0:0> That
truly is humorous, heh.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, I suppose that is that.<sp:5:0:0> It's such a
relief that the domain is safe once more!

Please allow me to thank you.
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Still... <sp:5:1:0>Please do not fret.<sp:5:0:0>


We have already gathered our troops and
are preparing to take out our enemy!

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>We'll make them pay for their actions!<sp:5:1:0> Ah,
my fins are shivering with excitement!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>His only daughter, Dunma, is on a
solo assignment. I can understand
why he'd be worried.
But Dunma is over 60 years old. Sure,
she still has some of the mannerisms of
childhood, but she's a first-rate soldier.
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>As a veteran soldier himself, it's simply
not fitting for him to get distracted just
because he's apart from his daughter.
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Please go on ahead! I'm sure Prince
Sidon will be thrilled to see you.
talk0026_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>Even though the sludge is gone,
these foul villains keep showing up.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's no small task to continuously clean
that amount of dirty water.

On top of that, he must also deploy
everyone where they're needed most and
oversee the investigation of the ruins.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Prince Sidon really is amazing!
